summary: Changes visuals of the Ebony Mail's cloak effects and prevents it from breaking Ice Form.
descriptionHtml:
The Ebony Mail is cool looking, so when you go into combat suddenly it turns into a black mess and doesn't look so pretty anymore. This removes the shader and smoke from the wearer, however any enemies hit by the cloak will still turn black and become smothered in smoke. While sneaking, the wearer will turn black but the obtrusive smoke is removed.

This also makes the cloak effect not damage enemies frozen by the Ice Form shout.

The mod is incompatible with mods that changes the following magic effects:
- Boethiah's Embrace (DA02ArmorPoisonCloak)
- Ebony Mail Poison Damage (DA02PoisonDamageFFContact)
- Ebony Mail Muffle (DA02MuffleConstantSelf)

Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim
author: ceruulean
